attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr Tony Blair.
For years now the public transport have increased the ticket price at ea very high rate. Can you please intervene to stop these increases yearly. People pay high fares but the pay rise does not increase at the same rate. More people communiting to London pay ridiculous fares and those who live outside london pay ridiculous bus fares which are not transferrable to train journeys. Can the government do something to stop these public transport companies reaping off hardworking commuters.
